name: Madhura
greetingText: Today is your special day, the day you were born! 🎂
wishText: May your 25th year be filled with happiness, love, and success.
textInChatBox: Happy 25th Birthday, my love! You make my world brighter every single day. ❤️
text2: I thought of buying you something fancy...
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Hope you loved this little birthday surprise! 💖
replayText: Click here to relive your birthday magic again 🎉
